title: Project Fatherhood: Dads Confront Challenges In Tough LA Neighborhood
teaser: Fathers, who are ex-gang members from one of Los Angeles' toughest public housing projects, banded together to learn how to become better dads, so their kids will avoid the fate that's plagued them.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
